about.teamSubtitle: Experts in compliance and technology working together to transform corporate ethical management
about.giovannaShort: Giovanna has worked at various financial institutions in Miami, USA, as a consultant specialized in managing and implementing crime prevention models. She is a lawyer from the University of Chile, has a Master in Comparative Law from the University of Miami (LL.M.) and is certified as a specialist in Anti-Money Laundering by ACAMS.
about.giovannaFull: Giovanna has worked at various financial institutions in Miami, USA, as a consultant specialized in managing and implementing crime prevention models. In Latin America, she participated in the implementation and certification of BHP Billiton Base Metals' Compliance Program, in accordance with the Foreign Corrupt Practices Act, UK Bribery Act and Chilean Law No. 20393 on Criminal Liability of Legal Entities. This experience has given her extensive knowledge of Anti-Money Laundering and Anti-Corruption legislation in the USA and Latin America. In addition, Giovanna has managed compliance programs in the pharmaceutical industry and medical devices as Compliance Officer for Stryker, Grünenthal and Novartis. She is a lawyer from the University of Chile, has a Master in Comparative Law from the University of Miami (LL.M.) and is certified as a specialist in Anti-Money Laundering by the Association of Certified Anti-Money Laundering Specialists (ACAMS). She obtained a diploma in legal English at Columbia University in New York and was a professor in the Compliance Officer Diploma program at Adolfo Ibáñez University in Miami.
about.cristianBio: Cristian is an Industrial Civil Engineer from the University of Santiago, with an MBA in International Business from Federico Santa María University. He worked at leading companies such as Siemens and BHP Billiton. He is a Full-Stack Developer and solution architect.

informationCollected.title: Information We Collect
informationCollected.content: Access to certain services offered on the site may require entering personal data, namely: email address, name, surname, full address, document type and number and other optional data, or any other information that allows you to be identified.

useInformation.title: Use of Information
useInformation.content: The data you enter on the Site will be used for: sending information about Products and services, reporting Irregularities, analysis and investigations, Compliance, Legal advice, applications for negotiation and claims management services prior to litigation, internal and external communication systems, obtaining statistics.

security.title: Security and Protection
security.content: Eticpro guarantees users who enter their data on the Site, that they will be encrypted to preserve the security, integrity and confidentiality of data considered personal. The encryption system means that the data can only be interpreted by Eticpro.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content1: The user may access their personal data, rectify, cancel or object to their processing, by notifying the database administrator
